import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-modal', templateUrl: './modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./modal.component.css'] }) export class ModalComponent { closeModal : boolean = false; public closeModalWindow() { const dialog = document.getElementById("dialog")!; this.closeModal = !this.closeModal; console.log("dialog: ", dialog.getAttribute('open')); if(this.closeModal) dialog.setAttribute('open', 'true'); else dialog.setAttribute('open', 'false'); } }
